name: War Blade
description:
War Blade is a Fight-for-survive arena game in era of cold weapon.20 Players are thrown to an abandoned island. Beast,Guard and other Players whaterever you can find on the island are deadly enemies.You must scavenge equipments and supplies as soon as possible and ready to fight for your llife!

The safe zone on this island will shrink with time,This makes survive even harder.So what you going to do? Attacking others and rob their items? or just hiding to the end? The choice is yours. But remeber, only the last one standing can be the Winner!
